name: HELL ROSE
description:
Platformer without jump button, Shooter with no guns, complete with a boss battle.

For Gameplay only 2 keyboard buttons and Mouse is used.

In a level when you reach a rotating  portal, press ENTER to proceed.

 If you find the game difficult, you can skip any level by simply pressing ENTER, but it's not recommended. 

Throwing orbs does the following-

1. Imparts momentum

2. Kills enemies

3. The orbs that you throw, if they fall on the ground, will grow a Rose on that spot. If the player comes in contact with it, then there will be an additional damage.

Keep pressed the ESCAPE Key in the title screen to read further instructions.

Any suggestions are welcome.

( The first level is kept easy deliberately. You don't need to kill any enemy to beat it )
